title: nA ceyi viDavakurA
sahitya:
nA ceyi viDvakurA nAmIda dayayuncarA


anupallavi

  O carAcarAdhArA nI caraNamu neranammiti


caraNam    dEva dEva shrI vAsudEva mahA dEvanuta nA vyathalanu dIrccuTaku nIvigAka vErevaru 
bhAvuka phaladA catura bhuvana mOhanAkAra dEvakI sukumArabrOvavayya shrIkara
